column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We took a city tour where our guide dissed Lou's and said this other place by the Willis tower was the best in town (don't remember the name now
column2: sorry).  After we visited the tower (tip: go there early to avoid huge lines!)
column3: we stopped by for a drink
column4: and the place was not that busy
column5: and the deep dish looked so so.  I suspect that our tour guide was getting a kickback to plug the place to visitors.
